replies.body:
Why do apple fan boys have to join this thread? . -.  You got your own thread, go "brag" about your customizability, 768p screen and A8 jokes there.

Same vise versa. This aint a war and the topics are here so the different communities can talk about each of their phones, not to trash talk the others with mostly completely irrelevant and made up arguments
